channel.title: Pure - Prayer or no Prayer?
channel.description:
I'm creating a pure right now with the following stats;
Attack 30/40 Strength 40/?? Defence 1/1 Hitpoints 34/?? Range 20/40 Mage 25/50 Prayer 1/??
Is it worth getting 31 or 33 or 43 prayer as a [b]f2p [/b] pker? I've been wondering for a while now, and I've already made two accounts with prayer, both were good, but kept getting owned by the same level.
Do you reckon pures should get prayer?

item.title: Pure - Prayer or no Prayer?
item.dc:creator: @0wn3d_n00b Ooo Java
item.description:
@0wn3d_n00b wrote:

Alrite…
Stats for the best low level pures:
Attack: 50
Strength: 70+
Def: 1
Range: 60+
Mage: 60+
Prayer: 31! (for str prayers, and protect)
You use range. then when low hp, you use a g maul, OR you use a rune scimmy and a g maul.

Or, this is what i did ( i don’t really advise it)
Attack: 60
strength: 70+
def: 1
range: anything
mage: anything
Prayer: 1

That last one is TERRIBLE for a pker. Because you seem to find that your being owned by maulers who have 80+ strength. And everytime you die, you loose your dds/d long/d scimmy. So then you get called a 1 itemer, then u get another wep and die.

So i would get 31 prayer. Then mayby when you get 70 attack+ get 52. So you can smite ect.
I agree, Pures should have prayer. Apart from stakers…but you always have a temptation to go into the wildy no matter what kind of account you are!

Hope this helped!

~Ollie

Read full topic

item.title: Pure - Prayer or no Prayer?
item.dc:creator: @Ca1lum Ca1lum
item.description:
@Ca1lum wrote:

No so many people think it is good it is not people your own level will own you hard

Attack 30/40
Strength 40/60
Defence 1/1
Hitpoints 34/What eva it gets to
Range 20/40
Mage 25/60
Prayer 1/1

Thos Stats own
